original_text: Your traders love to cheat people. They use false weights and measures. Your traders love to cheat people. They use false weights and measures. Your traders love to cheat people. They use false weights and measures. Your traders love to cheat people.
korean_text: 그는 상인이라 손에 거짓 저울을 가지고 속이기를 좋아하는도다

sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 상인들은 사람들을 속이는 것을 좋아합니다.
